summary.body: I have today manually confirmed several new users who had applied to join. They should now be able to post and, unless I'm mistaken, none of them should be a spammer! For now while I look at upgrading the board there may be a delay of a day or two for any new user who attempts to sign up. If you want to speed up the process, please e-mail me using   with a request that I confirm your account. Hopefully we will still be free of spammers, though I can tell that automated systems have been trying to sign them up. Thanks Horseradish
summary.subject: All users please read - update on membership situation

summary.body: You may wish to respond here to the thread about Vandalism on the main residents' discussion area
summary.subject: Vandalism?
